This property verifies that whenever the CRC value is incorrect, the CRC error signal is properly asserted. 

Specifically, on every positive edge of the Clk clock signal, unless the Reset signal is active high (equal to 1), the property checks that if the 32-bit Crc signal does not equal the expected value 32'hc704dd7b, then the CrcError signal must be asserted (equal to 1).
